main event: A railroad workman observed a round object resembling a ball of fire in Roaring Springs, Texas.
interesting points: The object was the size of a volleyball and displayed a bright light yellow color that gradually changed to yellow, orange, and red., The sighting occurred at night under clear, starlit conditions., It lasted approximately 5 to 10 seconds., The observer reported a plane of light illuminating the area, which was similar to lightning., The report suggested that the phenomenon might be related to fireball lightning occurring during thunderstorms.
sighted object: round object shaped like a ball of fire
